name: Project Galactic ASSULT
description: Click the window to start. The controls are like most NES game emulators: Z X arrow keys and Enter. i would rate this game NES hard, hard but also needlessly punishing. This game was built in scratch as you can see and packaged it turbowarp, a scratch mod that compiles the game into javascript. built in slightly less than 15 days for the lospec game jame #1. Also this is my first game jam so i hope i did okay. also sorry for no pausing.
